titleStmt.title: English-law, or, A summary survey of the houshold of God on earth and that both before and under the law, and that both of Moses and the Lord Jesus : historically opening the purity and apostacy of believers in the successions of ages, to this present : together with an essay of Christian government under the regiment of our Lord and King, the one immortal, invisible, infinite, eternal, universal prince, the Prince of Peace, Emmanuel.
titleStmt.author: Cock, Charles George.

titleStmt.title: English-law, or, A summary survey of the houshold of God on earth and that both before and under the law, and that both of Moses and the Lord Jesus : historically opening the purity and apostacy of believers in the successions of ages, to this present : together with an essay of Christian government under the regiment of our Lord and King, the one immortal, invisible, infinite, eternal, universal prince, the Prince of Peace, Emmanuel.
titleStmt.author: Cock, Charles George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert White for T.G. and Francis Tyton ...,

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatory" signed: Charls George Cock.
